statements: SELECT * FROM Feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Feedback ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_rating = 5 AND activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT feedback_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_ratings FROM Feedback GROUP BY feedback_rating HAVING total_ratings > 1 ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(feedback_rating) AS average_rating, MIN(activity_date) AS earliest_date, MAX(activity_date) AS latest_date FROM Feedback;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT id, campaign_name FROM campaign WHERE location='New York';
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, location FROM campaign WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE campaign_name = 'Campaign A';
SELECT campaign.campaign_name, campaign.location, feedback.feedback_text FROM campaign JOIN feedback ON campaign.campaign_name = feedback.campaign_name;

SELECT campaign.campaign_name, COUNT(*) as feedback_count FROM campaign LEFT JOIN feedback ON campaign.campaign_name = feedback.campaign_name GROUP BY campaign.campaign_name HAVING feedback_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing WHERE activity_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, feedback_text FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT activity_name, location, attendance FROM guerrilla_marketing WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY attendance DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_text, generated_by FROM analysis_report WHERE generated_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, location_city, location_country FROM locations ORDER BY location_country ASC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM marketing_activities WHERE activity_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_details FROM analytics WHERE feedback_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT marketing_activity FROM feedback;
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM marketing_activities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_city, location_state, location_country FROM locations WHERE location_country = 'USA' ORDER BY location_city ASC;
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_details FROM analytics INNER JOIN feedback ON analytics.feedback_id = feedback.id WHERE feedback.customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM guerrilla_marketing_feedback WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM marketing_locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, team_size FROM marketing_team WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, location_id FROM guerrilla_marketing_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, marketing_strategy FROM guerrilla_marketing_feedback WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM marketing_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
